name: Mortacrust (You Gotta Rake)
description:
You are a green ninja who must rake his way to the surface. 

Mortacrust (You Gotta Rake) was made for 7 Day Broughlike, so it was inspired by some of Michael Brough's puzzle games like Corrypt and Game Title. Also turn-based puzzlers like Full Bore, DROD, and Stephen's Sausage Roll.

CONTROL is simple USE LEFT/RIGHT ARROWS or A/D. Finding out exactly what you and you rake can do is more complex! This game has REWIND ability USE SPACE BAR.

Currently there are 9 levels and no ending. I have more challenges and an ending planned so check back!

Thank you, I hope you escape The Mortacrust!
